Gap Analysis.title: Gap Analysis
Gap Analysis.description: Do you want to mitigate risks, costs, rework and develop improvements in your business? Is your company in need of a quick diagnosis? Kivalita Consulting believes that in order to initiate changes, you need to know where to start!
Gap Analysis.content:
GAP ANALYSIS

Want to know how to improve your business performance?

Does your company need a quick and reliable diagnosis?

When you want changes to materialise you need to identify where to begin.

Kivalita Consulting understands that need and delivers at detecting gaps in your business that might be slowing you down!

Improvements are an inevitable gateway to success. This process can be overwhelming and stressful. GAP Analysis can be applicable to any area of your business areas.

Request a Quote

How does Kivalita perform the GAP Analysis?

Kivalita Analyses all documentation involved in the process remotely (after signing an NDA). Kivalita offers a cryptographed plataform for documents update/storage.
Phase 1
Kivalita Team visits copmany sites and evaluate all process. We take pictures of evidences and put them into the report.
Phase 2
Development report.
Phase 3
Meeting to present GAPs and how Kivalita can help to solve them.
Phase 4
Gap Analysis.methodContent: A detailed and accurate evaluation is obtained upon implementing unique quality tool on existing processes. Documents and information are checked and placed according to their criticality, impact on business and execution of current legislation.
Gap Analysis.advantageContent:
Benefits of performing GAP analysis with Kivalita Consulting

  • Processes meeting quality parameters and relevant legislation;
  • Threats and improvement opportunities;
  • Indicators for assertive decisions;
  • Wastes, losses, rework or reprocess;
  • Opportunities to assist in both process performance and collaborators training;
  • Critical analysis over the process for a continuous improvement.
Gap Analysis.complement:
Request a Quote

In Life Science, GAP Analysis is applicable to:

  • Industries
  • Importers and Distributors
  • Suppliers
  • Laboratories

Other fields GAP Analysis may be applicable:

  • Any line of business that seeks process evaluation for developing improvements, besides cost mitigation, risks and reworks.

Sistema da Qualidade.title: Quality System Projects - QSM
Sistema da Qualidade.description: No matter how big your company is, Kivalita Consulting adapts and develops QSM under your company needs and its area of operations.
Sistema da Qualidade.content:
QUALITY SYSTEM

What is a Quality System?

The Quality Management System (QMS) is a set of interconnected elements, integrated in the organization, which works as a mechanism to achieve the Quality Policy and company's objectives, making products and services distinct and excel customer expectations.

Why should companies have a Quality System?

Ensuring portfolio quality is more than an option for companies. It is a necessity! This is because, both the competition has become stronger, and the customer has become more demanding in relation to what they buy.

That is why, when it comes to the quality of a product or service, the concept involves meeting certain requirements so that the characteristics and the production or its process guarantee consumer satisfaction. In this sense, the Quality Management System has become fundamental in the reality of companies in any industry.

Request a Quote

But what exactly is Quality Management?

Also defined by the acronym SGQ, the Quality Management System is the organizational structure responsible for managing and guaranteeing the quality of the product or service, considering the necessary resources, operational procedures and established activities.

In order to achieve such goals, the rules are documented and formalized in the Quality Manual, defining which is the most appropriate management model for the quality of the final product or service. In other words, the QMS guides how an activity should be carried out, with what resources and under whose responsibility.

It takes into account three aspects: Project, Production and Product or Service use.

QUALITY SYSTEM

How ISO 9001 can help you

See all your benefits

The company that has a QMS (Quality Management System) based on ISO 9001, transmits to its client that:

  • It has a low rate of complaints
  • Greater customer focus
  • Greater involvement of people.
  • Performs a process and systemic approach.
  • And it has continuous improvement

QUALITY SYSTEM

Activity Branch

Request a Quote
  • Medicines, Cosmetics and Sanitizers, Importers and distributors;
  • Pharmaceutical, Cosmetic, Food and Sanitizing Industries;
  • Analysis laboratories: Physical-Chemical, Microbiological or ISO 17025;
  • Companies that wish to adjust the Quality Management System to serve pharmaceutical companies or just maintain procedures;
Note: our expertise is also for multinational startups and / or importers.
Sistema da Qualidade.methodContent: A diagnosis of your business is carried out through a Gap Analysis, demonstrating what needs to be defined and improved, making the project lean and mitigating risks of extra costs and rework.
Sistema da Qualidade.advantageContent:
With a well structured quality system, your business will develop in:

  • Standardization of the process: Predictable, Repeatable, Reproducible and Robust Processes before Activities
  • Change control: Despite the changes in the Staff, Legislation and Demand, its Processes, Products and Services will remain with the consistent Quality.
  • Quality indicators: Mitigation costs, Rework, Poor Performance, etc. for process improvements.
  • Risk mitigation: Through periodic Risk Analysis that only a QMS can offer, it is possible to visualize points that are crucial for decision making by leaders and investors.

Continuous K.title: Continuous K
Continuous K.description: Não importa o tamanho da empresa, a Kivalita Consulting adequa ou desenvolve o SGQ conforme as necessidades e a área de atuação da sua empresa.
Continuous K.content:
QUALITY AND TECHNOLOGY ADVISORY

CONTINUOUS K

Assistance for project implementation, led by a bilingual specialist, through periodic follow-ups, training and support, guiding your team to its best version, besides providing optimizations in the process, promoting the consequent continuous growth of your business.

What does Continuous K offer?

  • Quality and technology and regulatory advice regarding specific demands according to the business line.
  • 4-6 follow-up meetings during the month;
  • 2 monthly trainings (up to 2h per training);
  • Support, email, WhatsApp during business hours; ​
  • Weekly project reports and dashboards.
  • Advice for adaptation to certification (ISO / ONA)
  • Management and planning of activities via real-time platform (of the company's employees);
  • Indicators for decision making regarding processes;
  • User manual (e-book);
Request a Quote

Who IS IT FOR?

Industries, importers and distributors in the pharmaceutical, cosmetic, sanitizing, chemical, food and other sectors.

Request a Quote

WHO IS THE CONTINUOUS K TEAM?

A multidisciplinary team, represented by a bilingual specialist who will carry out weekly follow-ups with the team, providing necessary advice, promoting quality and continuous improvement in the company.

Through evaluations, consultations on legislation and training, Kivalita Consulting will provide the necessary support, considering technologies applicable to the process, in addition to enhancing the team involved with specific training, whether technical or behavioral.

This work ensures that the company maintains continuous quality improvement.

WHAT IS THE Continuous K USER GUIDE’S CONTENT?

Support material

  • Follow-up platform (Microsoft teams, whatsapp and other platforms);
  • How to update the status of tasks;
  • How to generate reports and activities;
  • Good time management practices for those involved;
  • How to use encrypted platforms to upload files (Share Point®) ;
  • Forms;
  • Monitoring of the project;
  • Location of files and training materials available (Share Point®);
  • Customer success
Request a Quote

WHAT IS YOUR BEST OPTION?

Continuous K

Advisory solution for your business:

  • 4 Management Follow Ups and monthly guidance in QMS / BPx;
  • Technology advice (process automation);
  • Communication for daily support;
  • 2 monthly trainings;
  • Support material;
  • Reports and dashboards;

Prerequisites

Minimal Team: 2 people dedicated to Quality or responsible for processes / projects, with computer with office package and internet access.

Branches of activity: Industries, importers and distributors in the pharmaceutical, cosmetic, sanitizing, chemical, food and other sectors.

Duration: 12 months or +

BUY NOW!

Continuous K Plus

Advisory solution for your business:

  • 6 Management Follow Ups and monthly guidance in QMS / BPx;
  • Communication for daily support;
  • 4 monthly trainings;
  • Support material;
  • Reports and dashboards;
  • Regulatory advice;
  • Technology advice (process automation);
  • Advice on Adequacy to certification (ISO / ONA);

Prerequisites

Minimal Team: : 2 or + people per site, from the areas of quality or involved, with a computer with an office package and internet access.

Branches of activity: Industries, importers and distributors in the pharmaceutical, cosmetic, sanitizing, chemical, food and other sectors.

Duration: 12 months or +

BUY NOW!
Continuous K.methodContent:
Phase 1 - Gap Analysis (Recommended)

GAPs are identified in the process for an overview what actions to take, considering their criticality to be solved in the short, medium or long term.

Phase 2 - Continuous K

Following the PDCA quality premise (Plan, Do, Check and Act), the works will consider:

Follow Up

Weekly meetings to stimulate actions to be concluded, with planning of review and evaluation of the processes.

Carrying out actions

Process of elaborating and carrying out the necessary actions, with communication for any doubts.

Check

In this phase, reports are generated in real time for possible adjustments and new decisions.

Multiplication

Training and extension of actions on the company's processes, developing business employees, by multiplying the knowledge acquired with Kivalita.
Continuous K.advantageContent:
• Remote Solution (follow-ups and online training);
  • Assistance in conducting activities and making decisions about processes and people for the success of the project;
  • Team engagement: Actions that promote employees' autonomy and recognition in relation to projects;
  • Savings with specialized labor: availability of a multidisciplinary team, for the cost of 1 employee;
  • Possibility of adaptation to different legislation and ISO Certifications;
  • Evaluation for process automation;
  • Focus on strategic company projects, assisting in the feasibility and optimization of projects involving quality, regulatory or technology;
  • Predictability of activities with visualization on Kivalita's exclusive platform;
  • Weekly reports and dashboards of activities carried out by the entire team involved.

Certificações ISO.title: ISO Certifications
Certificações ISO.description: Has your company been certified or needs further information for how be granted one? Click here and learn more about Audits and Adaptations to Certifications.
Certificações ISO.content:
ISO CERTIFICATIONS

Is your company eligible for a Certification?

Recognizing which Certifications are applicable to your business can be an overwhelming task. Kivalita Consulting can assist you in this process. We can conduct a tailored audit as per your needs. Inspecting the possible Certifications your business is able to meet and what is missing to comply.

Contact Us!

KIVALITA CONSULTING recognizes that the Quality Management System has become fundamental in the reality of companies from any sector.

And when it comes to the quality of a product or service, KIVALITA CONSULTING understands that current needs involve meeting certain requirements, so that the features and the production process guarantee the satisfaction of the consumer.

Check some Standards that Kivalita Consulting provide adaptation:

  • ABNT ISO/NBR 9001:2015 Quality
  • ISO 14001:2015 Environment
  • ISO 45001:2018 Occupational Health and Safety
  • ABNT ISO/IEC 17025:2005 Laboratory and Calibrations
  • ISO/IEC 27001 ISMS Information Security Management System
Request a Quote

ISO CERTIFICATIONS

Is ISO Certification worth it?

The company that has a QMS (Quality Management System) based on ISO 9001, transmits to its client that:

  • Increase in the quality of the product or service offered;
  • Greater customer focus;
  • Greater involvement of people;
  • Performs a systemic approach to processes;​
  • And ut guarantees continuous improvement.
See all your benefits

ISO CERTIFICATIONS

Activity Branch

Request a Quote

Kivalita Consulting is an expert in Life Science companies. With our Multidisciplinary team we also serve any business that seeks to adapt to an ISO's. We value growth and proudly offer our exclusive services to:

  • Any line of business that seeks to meet a Certification;
  • Companies that already have ISO Certification or need to maintain it and
  • In addition to sharing our experience with larger or wellknow companies, we also specialize in new businesses or start-ups.
Certificações ISO.methodContent: A diagnosis of your business is carried out through a GAP Analysis, demonstrating what needs to be defined and improved for an ISO certification, making the project lean and mitigating risks of extra costs and rework.
Certificações ISO.advantageContent:
With a well-structured quality system, your business will become develop in:

  • Standardization of processes (your processes are predictable, repeatable, reproducible and robust to the activities);
  • ISO Certification: A differential for the demanding consumer;
  • Change control (even with changes in employees / legislation / demand, their processes, products and services will remain with the same quality);
  • Quality indicators for process improvements (mitigating costs, rework, low performance, etc.);
  • Risk mitigation (Through periodic risk analysis that only a QMS can offer, it is possible to view points that are crucial for decision making by leaders and investors).

Types of translation we do:

Mirror Translation

The translation is faithful to the source document, without any changes.

Revised translation

The translation is carried out with the revision of the technical part of the document, making the understanding of the described process clear and objective in the desired language.

Projetos Laboratoriais e LTA.title: Laboratory Projects and LTA
Projetos Laboratoriais e LTA.description: We develop your project either laboratorial or industrial from scratch and you can count on a multidisciplinary team of real experts
Projetos Laboratoriais e LTA.content:
LABORATORY PROJECTS AND / OR TAR

We are specialized in developing laboratories

One large aspect of starting a lab is the sheer number of decisions that need to be made fast and constantly. From Place to first Projects to first Lab Members to first major Purchases, it can all be extremely overwhelming. Kivalita Consulting has first-hand experiences in developing Laboratories. Kivalita Consulting has first-hand experiences in developing Laboratories ​

Kivalita Consulting offers a multidisciplinary team for the development of The Project, with a distinctive assortment of Pharmacists, Chemists and Biologists working in the area, in addition to Engineers and Architects.

As experts, We know how to develop a Laboratory from scratch with the required project measures:
  • Number of necessary equipment
  • procedures in compliance with the legislation,
  • specialized labor (if they want to hire labor with Kivalita Consulting) and
  • Everything the laboratory needs in a lean way (glassware, consumables, etc.)
Request a Quote

LABORATORY PROJECTS AND / OR TAR

LABORATORY PROJECTS

Request a Quote

Stand-out Projects

We understand that Launching your own laboratory marks the beginning of a new and exhilarating phase of your career.

Companies that need to have a laboratory:

  • Medicines, Cosmetics and Sanitizing Products, Importers and Distributors;
  • Pharmaceutical, Cosmetics, Food and Sanitizing Industries;
  • Analysis Laboratories: Physical-Chemical, Microbiological or liable to ISO 17025;
  • Companies that want to adapt the QMS for Pharmaceutical or Maintenance Companies.

Specific laboratory:

  • Physical-Chemical Analysis Laboratory
  • Microbiological Analysis Laboratory
  • Laboratory with Clean Area Classification
Note: We proudly share our expertise with any size Companies and of any ages, including start-ups.

LABORATORY PROJECTS AND / OR TAR

Technical Assessment Report

Our dedication towards the improvement and meeting of our client’s objectives have made us experts in this experience.

What is a TAR?

TAR, Technical Assessment Report is the first step to be taken in obtaining the Sanitary License. It is a process that describes, through architectural projects, reports and memorials, the activities that will be developed in the buildings.

The process will be analyzed by the Health Surveillance and once approved it will allow the company to continue the Sanitary License process

Request a Quote

When is TAR presented?

In the initial company registration and whenever there are changes in the expansion or adaptation of the establishment.

Who needs TAR?

Any business that needs a TAR update as regards the city hall and health surveillance or even the development of one from scratch, in the following fields of activity:

  • Manufacturing, Distribution, Fractionation and Packaging,
  • Transportation and Storage of health-related products,
  • Cosmetics, Sanitizing Products, Health Products, Hygiene Products and medicines.
  • For the food sector, only industry (only be for manufacturing activity)
  • Other areas that need this process are health services providers, such as clinics, hospitals, specialty clinics, nursing homes, hospital laundries, laboratories, counterparts
Projetos Laboratoriais e LTA.methodContent: A visit is made to Evaluate, Obtain and Develop the Blueprint for The Project Development.
Projetos Laboratoriais e LTA.advantageContent:
As a multidisciplinary team, the project mitigates problems as in:

  • Development of the Laboratory with or without air classification.
  • Appropriate assessment and quantification of utilities needed for equipment and activities.
  • Studying Operations, Demand, Types

titles.Analista em Desenvolvimento de TI / Full: IT Development Analyst / Full Stack Developer

descriptions.Analista da Garantia de Qualidade – Qual:
Expertise: Experience with equipment qualification (Factory and Quality Control), with differential knowledge in validations (system validation and cleaning).

Work in the preparation, review and approval of protocols and reports of Equipment Qualification, and must know how to prepare and carry out URSs, DQ, IQ, OQ, PQ of laboratory and factory equipment, based on IN 47/2019 and IN 43 / 2019 from DRC 301: 2019

Conduct a survey of requirements and needs for the performance of equipment qualifications, as well as knowledge of risk analysis of equipment.

It will act in the preparation of POPs of Equipment, and procedures relevant to the subject (maintenance, qualification, calibration and validation).

Knowledge of procedures pertaining to quality assurance such as CAPAs, Self-Inspections and Supplier Qualification. Participation in daily reports and calls to the headquarters team in English.

Requirements: Higher Education in Pharmacy, Chemistry or related areas. Advanced English for reading and writing protocols.

Differential: Postgraduate in Quality. Participation in Quality System Implementation, Knowledge in system validation.

  • Contrcting regime:  Prestador de serviços (PJ)
  • Work hours: Monday to Friday, from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm.
  • Remuneration: R$ 5.800,00
  • Addtional information  Additional information: We are a consulting company specialized in quality looking for professionals to work in the most diverse areas of the pharmaceutical, cosmetic, chemical, sanitizing and veterinary industries. Initial 6-month contract, which may be extended depending on performance. Must own vehicle and availability for travel.
  • Languages:  Advanced English for reading and writing protocols.
descriptions.Analista Financeiro II:
Accounts payable and receivable processing. Analysis and control of costs, expenses, bank reconciliations for identification of all payments, checking and control of bank statements, payroll checking, organize tax payments, invoicing and issuing customer invoices, payments to suppliers, analysis of the company’s financial operations, collection of billing data, cash flow analysis, simulations and strategic billing projections, identifying and solving economic and financial problems. Suggest measures to improve the company’s financial performance, study of investments and financing, negotiation of terms. Study the economic viability of services, as well as their adaptation in the market. Negotiation of service contracts. Make collections and prepare financial reports (Income Statement, Cash Flow and Trial Balance). Knowledge in another language is desirable. You should be proactive, analytical, responsible, organized, be attentive to details, know how to plan, execute deadlines, work as a team and have communication and interpersonal relationships. Higher Education in Business Administration, Accounting, Economics, Finance, Management, or related areas. Enjoy dealing with numbers. You need to know how to work with spreadsheets. Notions of strategic management.

  • Contracting regime: CLT
  • Work hours: Monday to Friday, from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm.
  • Additional information:  Availability for travel and versatility to always learn new activities. It will be a differential to have your own vehicle.
  • Languages: Portuguese and English
descriptions.Analista em Desenvolvimento de TI / Full:
Work in the Full Stack .Net / Angular development area. Performing maintenance and improvements on the company’s own website, as well as being responsible for the development, implementation and maintenance of the software of our partner companies and customers. Design and develop internal systems that will help to improve the company’s results. Being able to face new challenges, extensive knowledge in .NET (C #) and good practices for the development / maintenance of APIs, domain in databases (relational and non-relational) and query automation for SQL queries. Knowledge of good clean code practices, knowledge in development with frameworks such as Angular, React or Vue.js. Know how to use tools for versioning control (Git) and experience with CMS (WordPress).


  • Contracting regime: CLT
  • Work hours: Monday to Friday, from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm.
  • Additional information:  Availability for travel and versatility to always learn new activities. It will be a differential to have your own vehicle.
  • Languages: Portuguese and English

first.title: Looking for audits to qualify your suppliers or evaluate your business?
first.footer: Performing audits should be part of the routine of any company, because through this evaluation it is possible to have concrete, transparent and secure information about the processes, identifying possible flaws in the quality system and corporate internal control.

second.title: Modalities
second.subtitle: Through our team of multidisciplinary auditors, we enable audits in three contractual ways:

first.title: 360º Audit
first.text: Cooperative Group of companies interested in international audits of IFAs, with apportionment of costs between the participating companies.

second.title: Audit Contract
second.text: Modality for companies seeking to perform national or international audits at a predictable monthly cost per month.

third.title: One-off audits
third.text: Conducting audits in a punctual, effective and fast way. In this acquisition you can perform audits for internal company evaluation or to qualify a vendor.

inner.title: 360º Audit
inner.text: Ahead of RDC 301/2019, RDC 304/2019, RDC 69/2014 in Good Manufacturing Practices of IFAs, Kivalita Consulting offers a cooperative group for companies seeking the opportunity to perform supplier audits around the world at a reduced cost, promoting quality for companies wishing to participate in this group.
inner.text2: For this, the company only needs to register (no registration cost) to know the existing groups.

inner.text: Kivalita Consulting has created audits of suppliers around the world in a cooperative manner, ensuring cost reduction for companies wishing to participate in this group and receive the audit report.
inner.text3: The amount will split more with each new company that joins the group and you only pay the required amount of audits for your business.
inner.text4: Perform here a simulation of audit costs in this group:

fifth.title: National and Internal Audits
fifth.OptionsTitle: Considering the contractual modalities of the Audit and Spot Audits Contract, and through a multidisciplinary team of auditors, Kivalita Consulting conducts audits in the following areas:
fifth.footer: Punctual Audit and Internal Audits has as mission to verify the GAPs or possible opportunities for improvements in processes in order to avoid deviations, extra costs in the process and rework.

sixth.title: You supplier, seeking to qualify to serve the Brazilian market?
sixth.OptionsTitle: After issuing a new law in Brazil for pharmaceutical industries (RDC 301/2019) suppliers are required to qualify through face-to-face auditing for suppliers who produce raw materials and packaging material outside and within Brazil.
sixth.OptionsTitle2: Would you like to go out and qualify with Kivalita consulting and open a market in Brazilian industries? We audit the most diverse areas, being:
sixth.footer: Through a one-time face-to-face audit, Kivalita Consulting with its multidisciplinary team will be able to share this qualification with companies that are of interest in Brazil. Want to know more? Fill out this form and receive our contact.

seventh.title: What's the best option for you?

first.title: Audit 360
first.text: Solution for those seeking low cost through a  international audits coperative group:

Options.first: Define the number of audits you need to perform per month, according to a priority schedule of audits;
Options.second: Limit the number of audits per month to suit the budget;
Options.third: Categorization of suppliers to audit according to their criticality before the business or legislation;
Options.fourth: Conducting audits considering Applicable Legislation (GMP/ GMP), business strategy and/or ISOs.

second.title: National Audits Contract
second.text: Solution for those who seek cost predictability without giving up a routine of monthly audits in suppliers

Options.first: Define the number of audits you need to perform per month, according to an audit priority schedule;
Options.second: Limit the number of audits per month to suit the budget.
Options.third: Categorization of suppliers to audit according to their criticality before the business or legislation;
Options.fourth: Conducting audits considering Applicable legislation (GMP/ GMP), business strategy and/or ISOs.

third.title: Punctual Audits
third.text: Solution for those looking for an internal point assessment (for ISO or GMP) or a single audit on a specific vendor.

Options.first: Define the modality you want to perform and direct the focus of the audit (ISO, ONA, RDCs, BPFs, etc.);
Options.second: List business strategy needs and verify that the sectors (or supplier) are meeting them;
Options.third: Get a full report for decision making about detected GAPs.

eighth.method: Auditors are provided to carry out qualification, according to the specificity of each supplier, legislation or ISO regulations.
eighth.benefits:
• Provision of variability of specialized labor for the qualification of suppliers according to the type of supplier and legislation to be followed (ISO);
  • Assistance for the realization of qualifications at national and international auditing level;
  • Possibility of carrying out several audits in a short period of time to meet qualification schedules.

nineth.title: PLATFORM FOR AUDIT MANAGEMENT
nineth.text: Follow in real time the planned audits and actions about your project through mobile phones or computers through kivalita's exclusive platforms!
nineth.text2: This digital access is exclusive to Kivalita Consulting and we don't charge anything else for it!

tenth.title: AFTER AUDITS WERE CARRIED OUT, What NOW?
tenth.text: The monitoring of the GAPs/Deviations detected is necessary, in addition to the allocation of employees to carry out the planned actions.
tenth.text2: But how to carry out effective management without leaving  that nothing is forgotten and ensure communication suppliers (national or international) at low cost?
tenth.text3: For those who seek this vision facilitated and without concern Kivalita offers the Continuous K solution.
tenth.text4: Click here to learn more about this modality of continuous k advice
